If you **score a critical hit**, and you cast a Taijutsu with the **Finisher** keyword of equal rank **before the end of the current turn**, its **cost is reduced by half**.

Until the end of your turn, you can target **one affected creature** with a Taijutsu Finisher **regardless of range**, once per turn, using either an **Action or Bonus Action**, ignoring its listed casting time.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the **range and movement** by +5 feet.
- **B-Rank or higher:** Increase the damage by **+1d10**.
- **S-Rank or higher:** Increase the damage by an additional **+1d10**.

Crane Wing Formation.description:
You **leap and perform a swinging attack** that takes the form of a Crane, then attempt to **grapple and slam a target creature** to the ground.

Make a **Taijutsu attack** against a creature within 5 feet. On a **hit**, the target is **knocked Prone and Grappled**. You may have as many creatures Grappled as you have hands.

A creature Grappled by this jutsu must use its **Action** to make a **Strength Saving Throw** to escape. This jutsu **bypasses normal grapple rules**. On a **failed save**, you may make an **unarmed attack** against the target, dealing **twice your Unarmed Damage** on a hit.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3. At **C-Rank or higher**, you may target **one additional creature** with this jutsu.

Cyclone Surge.description:
You **leap into the air**, performing a spinning strike that hits and knocks all nearby enemies upward.

You leap **15 feet into the air**, striking all creatures within 5 feet. Make a **Melee Taijutsu Attack**, comparing the result to each target's AC. On a **hit**, deal **Unarmed Damage + 2d4** and the target is **launched 15 feet into the air**, becoming **Airborne** until the end of the current turn.

An Airborne creature **cannot cast jutsu with the Mobility (M) keyword** until they land. No falling damage is taken as a result of this jutsu.

Until the end of your turn, **you or an allied creature** can target **one affected creature** with a **Taijutsu Finisher**, regardless of range, once per turn, using an **Action, Bonus Action, or Reaction**, ignoring its listed casting time.

Deep Dive.description:
You attempt to **grapple and body slam** a creature into the furthest reachable surface.

Make a **Grapple check** against a creature within 5 feet. On a **success**, move up to your full movement **toward the furthest surface** you can reach (such as a wall), slamming them into it and dealing **Bludgeoning Damage equal to your Unarmed Damage**. If no surface is reachable, slam them into the ground instead.

If you and the target are **standing on or submerged in water**, make the grapple **with advantage**. On a success, you instead dive **straight down up to twice your movement**, slamming them into the **seafloor**, dealing **Bludgeoning Damage equal to twice your Unarmed Damage**.

If you are **already grappling** the creature, you can use this jutsu to **slam them immediately** with no additional checks.

When the slam is successful, **your grapple ends**.

Demon Fist.description:
You perform a **powerful uppercut**, sending a **shockwave** surging along the ground toward your target.

Make a **Ranged Taijutsu Attack** against a creature within range that is **standing on the same surface** as you. On a **hit**, deal **3d6 Bludgeoning Damage**.

Until the end of your turn, you can target **one affected creature** with a **Taijutsu Finisher**, regardless of range, **once per turn**, using either an **Action or Bonus Action**, ignoring its listed casting time.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by **+1d6**.

Dempsey Roll.casting_time: 1 Reaction, which you take when you take damage from a melee attack or when a creature misses you with a melee attack
Dempsey Roll.description:
You assume a **boxer’s stance**, prepared to retaliate against melee attackers.

Until the start of your next turn, when a creature within 5 feet targets you with a **melee attack**, you may spend **4 Chakra** to **duck and weave**, granting a **+2 bonus to AC** against that creature’s attack.

After doing so, you may **immediately make an unarmed attack** in response. This **AC bonus can stack up to twice** (max +4 AC).

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the activation cost by 3. At **B-Rank**, the AC bonus increases by an **additional +1**.

Dragging Full Rotation.casting_time: 1 Reaction, which you take when a creature misses you with a melee attack
Dragging Full Rotation.description:
When a creature within 5 feet misses you with a **melee attack**, you reach out, grabbing them and using their own momentum against them.

You drag the creature **10 feet in any direction** of your choice, then throw them a distance equal to **5 × your Strength modifier** (minimum 5 feet).

If the creature's movement is **interrupted by a solid surface** (such as a tree or wall), it takes **1d6 Bludgeoning Damage for every 10 feet** it would have traveled.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the distance you throw the creature by **10 additional feet**.

Dragon Palm Strike.description:
As a requirement to activate this jutsu, you must currently be in the **Dragon Fist Stance**.

You perform a myriad of distracting movements before channeling chakra into your palm for a **powerful thrust**, striking a creature’s core and knocking them away.

Make a **Melee Taijutsu Attack** against a creature in range. On a hit, deal **your Unarmed Damage + 2d4** and push the target **10 feet**.

If used as a **Finisher**, you instead deal **your Unarmed Damage + 2d12**, and the push distance becomes **20 feet**.

If the target collides with a solid surface, it takes **1d6 Bludgeoning damage per 10 feet** it cannot be pushed further.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3, the damage by **+1d4 (or +1d12 if a Finisher)**, and the push distance by **5 feet**.

Draw!.casting_time: 1 Reaction, which you take when you take damage from an attack
Draw!.description:
As a **Reaction** when you would take damage from an attack, you dash backwards to create distance.

Move up to **10 feet away** from the attacker. Make a **contested Dexterity Saving Throw** against the attack roll result.

- **Success:** The attack **misses**, and you immediately move up to **20 feet toward the triggering creature**, making a **melee unarmed attack**.
- **Hit:** Deal **your Unarmed Damage + 2 [Unarmed Damage Die]**.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by **+1 [Unarmed Damage Die]**.

Dynamic Entry.description:
You perform a high jump kick that propels you towards a target creature you can see within range. Make a Taijutsu Attack.

- On a hit, the target takes 3d10 Bludgeoning Damage.
- Regardless of hit or miss, you move up to 30 feet, ending your movement within 5 feet of the original target.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 1d10.

Erratic Combo.description:
As a requirement to activate this jutsu, you must currently be in the **Drunken Fist Stance**.

You sway in and out of combat, dancing around your opponent in a drunken stupor throwing them off. Make two Melee Taijutsu Attacks against a single creature you can reach.

- On a hit, you deal 2d6 Bludgeoning Damage.
- Each successful hit increases your AC by +1 until the beginning of your next turn.

Until the end of your turn, you can target one affected creature with a Taijutsu Finisher regardless of range, once per turn, using either an Action or Bonus Action, ignoring its listed casting time.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 1d6.

Exorcism.description:
You perform a multi-strike combination with all of your Strength and Body weight. Make three Melee Taijutsu Attacks.

- On a hit, you deal 1d12 Bludgeoning Damage and push the target 5 feet in any direction of your choice.

If you score at least one hit on a creature, they must make a Constitution Saving Throw. On a failed save, they gain +1 rank of Bruised.

Until the end of your turn, you can target one affected creature with a Taijutsu Finisher regardless of range, once per turn, using either an Action or Bonus Action, ignoring its listed casting time.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3.
- If cast at B-Rank or higher, increase the damage by +1d12.
- If cast at S-Rank, increase the damage by an additional +1d12.

Falling Dragon.description:
As part of the activation of this jutsu, the target creature must be airborne or falling.

You leap upwards following an airborne or falling target. You curl your body into a ball as you spin faster and faster before you find yourself above the target. You uncurl yourself as you perform a spinning drop kick, sending the target creature crashing down.

Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack against the airborne or falling creature.

- On a hit, you deal your Unarmed Damage + 3d6, sending them crashing down into the ground and landing Prone.

- If this jutsu is used as a Finisher, you instead deal your Unarmed Damage + 3d6 Bludgeoning Damage. You then come falling after them at great speed, making a second Melee Taijutsu Attack, slamming both of your feet into the Prone creature.

- On a hit, you deal 3d6 Bludgeoning Damage.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 1d6.

Feather Combo.casting_time: 1 Action or 1 Reaction, which you take when you are falling or airborne
Feather Combo.description:
As part of the activation of this jutsu, you must be airborne, falling, or be targeting an airborne or falling creature.

You perform an aerial combo, striking out against a creature within range. Make two Melee Taijutsu Attacks.

- On a hit, you deal your Unarmed Damage.
- If you hit the same creature twice, you use the momentum of the second strike to propel yourself up to 20 feet in any direction of your choice and land in a space that can hold you suffering no falling damage.

Until the end of your turn, you can target one affected creature with a Taijutsu Finisher regardless of range, once per turn, using either an Action or Bonus action, ignoring its listed casting time.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by +1d6.

First Heavenly Breath: Inhale.description:
You increase your lung capacity twofold. Doing so increases your oxygen intake and your physical Strength similarly.

- You cannot lose concentration on this jutsu as a result of damage and you cannot maintain concentration on Ninjutsu or Genjutsu for the duration.
- Increase your Taijutsu Attack Bonus by +1.
- Increase your Taijutsu Damage by 1d8 twice per turn.
- Increase your Speed by +10.

Forceful Bull.description:
You focus chakra throughout your muscles, enhancing your physical Strength and fortitude.

- For the duration, your Strength and Constitution ability scores become 16 if they are lower than 16.
- You gain 15 Temporary Hit Points that last for the duration.
- When you cast a Taijutsu with the Finisher keyword, on a successful hit or if a target fails their Saving Throw, they gain +1 rank of Concussed.

Graceful Cat.description:
You focus chakra throughout your muscles, enhancing your physical Dexterity and Cunning.

- For the duration, your Dexterity and Wisdom ability scores become 16 if they are lower than 16.
- You do not suffer fall damage from falls less than 30 feet.
- Your movement speed is increased by 20 feet.
- You gain a +2 bonus to your passive perception.
- When you cast a Taijutsu with the Combo keyword, you gain +10 bonus to your movement speed until the end of the turn you cast it.

Hammer.description:
As part of the activation of this jutsu, you must be targeting a creature who can be targeted by a Taijutsu with the Finisher keyword regardless of range.

You bring your hands together, interlocking your fingers until your hands resemble a single bludgeoning device.

Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack dealing your Unarmed Damage + 3d8 Bludgeoning Damage.

The target must make a Strength Saving Throw. On a failed save, they gain +1 rank of Concussed and Dazed.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 1d8.

Heat Up.description:
You release a surge of chakra throughout your body, activating your body's adrenaline production and kicking it into high gear for a single swift moment while also increasing your body's sensitivity to pain. You cannot reduce the cost of this jutsu by any means.

- The next Taijutsu you cast that requires an attack roll increases its damage die by 1 step until the end of your turn. (D4 > D6 > D8 > D10 > D12)
- Additionally, until the beginning of your next turn, you gain vulnerability to the next instance of Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage from a hostile creature.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3.
- If cast at C-Rank or higher, reroll all 1’s, 2’s, and 3’s on damage dice, taking the second result.
- If cast at B-Rank or higher, increase damage dice by 1 additional step.
- If cast at A-Rank or higher, the next Taijutsu you cast that requires an attack roll ignores Resistance and Immunity.
- If cast at S-Rank, duration becomes 1 minute, increasing Taijutsu damage dice by 2 additional steps for the duration and you gain Vulnerability to Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing (your choice) for the duration.

High Monk.description:
You perform a high kick combo. Make two Taijutsu attacks, dealing your Unarmed Damage + 1d6.

- If used as a Finisher, you instead deal your Unarmed Damage + 2d6 and leap back 15 feet without provoking opportunity attacks. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the leap back range by 5 feet.
- If cast at B-Rank, increase the damage dealt by 1d6.
- If cast at S-Rank, increase the damage dealt by 2d6.

Howling Knuckle.description:
As a requirement to activate this jutsu, you must currently be in the Wolf Fist Stance. You do not spend chakra to maintain concentration on this jutsu.

You begin to exhibit the ferocious power of wolves as you become a one-person wolf pack. For the duration, you may perform the Wolf Fang Fist as a Bonus Action. You can do this once per turn.

Iron Knuckle.description:
As a requirement to activate this jutsu, you must currently be in the Iron Fist Stance.

You perform a single high-powered strike with full intention to cause harm. Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack. On a hit, you deal your Unarmed Damage + 2d6 and force the target to make a Strength Saving Throw. On a failed save, you knock them back a number of feet equal to 5 x your Strength ability modifier.

If this jutsu is used as a Finisher, you instead deal your Unarmed Damage + 4d6 and on a failed save they are knocked back a number of feet equal to 10 x your Strength ability modifier. If they strike a solid surface less than 5 feet thick, they break through it if they have 10 or more feet remaining to be knocked back, taking 3d6 Bludgeoning Damage.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and the damage by 1d6.

Iron Strike.description:
You punch with enough force to tear through any defense your enemy might have. Make a Taijutsu Attack. On a hit, they take your Unarmed Damage + 2d6.

If the target would cast a Jutsu as a Reaction to the damage you deal, the cost of their jutsu is increased by +4 due to the strain required to keep up with your strike. If their Jutsu does not cost chakra, they must spend 10 Chakra to take their Reaction.

If this jutsu is used as a Finisher, you instead deal your Unarmed Damage + 4d6 and the cost of Reaction jutsu cast against you is instead increased by +8.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost of this jutsu by 3, the damage by 1d8, and the cost increase of Reaction jutsu by +4.

Leaf Gale.description:
You perform a spinning low kick throwing your target off balance. A target creature in range must make a Dexterity Saving Throw.

- **Failure:** The target is knocked Prone and must spend an Action to stand until the end of their next turn.

Until the end of your turn, you can target one affected creature with a Taijutsu Finisher regardless of range, once per turn, using either an Action or Bonus action, ignoring its listed casting time.

Leaf Kick.description:
You deliver a single falling kick, strong enough to bring the environment crumbling down around you. Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack against a creature within range.

- **Hit:** You deal your Unarmed Damage + 1d12 and the target must make a Strength Saving Throw. On a failed save they gain 1 rank of Slowed until the end of their next turn.

- **Finisher:** You instead deal your Unarmed Damage + 3d12 and on a failed save the target falls Prone as you force them into the ground shattering it, causing the area within a 10-foot cube originating from you to be treated as difficult terrain.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and damage by 1d12.

Leaf Uppercut.description:
You perform a single backflip kick or rising uppercut with enough force to crack the ground underneath you. Make a single Melee Taijutsu Attack.

- **Hit:** You knock the creature 30 feet into the air dealing 3d6 Bludgeoning Damage.

Until the end of your turn, you can target one affected creature with a Taijutsu Finisher regardless of range, once per turn, using either an Action or Bonus action, ignoring its listed casting time. If the Taijutsu Finisher has the Leaf prefix, it increases its damage by +1 damage die.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and the damage by 1d6.

Leaping Strike.casting_time: 1 Reaction, which you take when an allied creature declares they are going to make a melee attack
Leaping Strike.description:
As a requirement to activate this jutsu, you must currently be in the Frog Fist Stance.

You enter a leaping stance prepared to support your team. When an allied creature within range declares they are going to make a melee attack against a creature within 30 feet of them, you stomp the ground, knocking them into the air as you leap and jut your feet out, launching them towards their target at high speeds.

The allied creature is moved up to 30 feet in a straight line towards their target, ending in a space adjacent to them of their choice, where they then must make their melee attack. When they do, they can use either your Taijutsu Attack Bonus or their normal attack bonus. Regardless, on a success, they deal additional damage equal to your Unarmed Damage.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and damage bonus by +1 [Unarmed Damage die].

Mirage Blitz.casting_time: 1 Reaction, which you take when you would take damage from a melee attack
Mirage Blitz.description:
You perform a special spinning dodge designed to give you a slight upper hand on your next strike. When you would take damage from a melee attack, you gain a +3 bonus to your AC, potentially turning a hit into a miss as you leap back and react with a single strike.

Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack against the triggering creature. On a hit, you deal twice your Unarmed Damage, pushing the target back 15 feet and the target must make a Strength Saving Throw, being knocked Prone on a failed save.

Moonlight High.description:
As part of the activation of this jutsu, you must also have moved at least 15 feet towards the target.

You make a leaping, spinning double roundhouse kick. Make two Melee Taijutsu Attacks.

- **Hit:** You deal your Unarmed Damage + 1d6. If both attacks are successful, the target is knocked back 20 feet and must make a Constitution Saving Throw. On a failed save they gain 1 rank of Confused.

Until the end of your turn, you can target one affected creature with a Taijutsu Finisher regardless of range, once per turn, using either an Action or Bonus action, ignoring its listed casting time.

Neck Chop.description:
You attempt to strike at a vital pressure point on the nape of the neck of a humanoid target. Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack.

- **Hit:** Deal your Unarmed Damage + 1d6 and the target must make a Constitution Saving Throw. On a failed save, they become Dazed.

Until the end of your turn, you can target one affected creature with a Taijutsu Finisher regardless of range, once per turn, using either an Action or Bonus action, ignoring its listed casting time.

Noble Impact.description:
You move in to strike your opponent by taking a regal series of attacks.

Make four Taijutsu Attacks against a single creature within range.

- **Hit:** You deal 1d6 Bludgeoning Damage.

If you successfully score at least two hits, the target cannot cast a Jutsu that requires Mobility (M) as an Action or Bonus Action until the end of their next turn.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and the number of attacks made by +1.

Ostrich Whirlwind.description:
As part of the activation of this jutsu, you can only use this Taijutsu against a Prone target who can be targeted by a Finisher.

You perform a rather acrobatic display of skill. By kicking a Prone creature, you propel yourself backward while performing a second sweeping kick while moving away.

Make two Melee Taijutsu Attacks.

- **Hit:** You deal your Unarmed Damage + 2d10.

You then choose a space you can see within 20 Feet, leaping to that location without triggering attacks of opportunity.

Praying Strike.description:
You make a powerful strike to the core of your opponent, sending shockwaves through their body that would break a lesser foe, and stun greater ones.

Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack.

- **Hit:** You deal 1d4 Bludgeoning Damage and force the target to make a Constitution Saving Throw. On a failed save, they are Stunned until the end of the current turn.

Until the end of your turn, you can target one affected creature with a Taijutsu Finisher regardless of range, once per turn, using either an Action or Bonus action, ignoring its listed casting time.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and the damage by 1d4. If this jutsu is cast at B-Rank or higher, increase the damage dealt by your Unarmed Damage.

Prideful Assault.description:
As a requirement to activate this jutsu, you must currently be in the Lion Fist Stance.

You enter a prideful stance showing your overwhelming superiority and power.

Make two Melee Taijutsu Attacks.

- **Hit:** You deal your Unarmed Damage + 1d6. If your targets have ranks of Fear, increase this jutsu's damage die by 1 step.

If this jutsu is used as a Finisher, you instead deal your Unarmed Damage + 1d10 and if you score two hits on the target, they must make a Wisdom Saving Throw, gaining +1 rank of Fear on a failed save.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and the damage by 1d6 or 1d10. If this jutsu is cast at A-Rank or higher, you can increase the number of attacks by +1.

Rabbit Fury.description:
As a requirement to activate this jutsu, you must currently be in the Rabbit Fist Stance.

You enter a blitzing stance, overwhelming your enemies with speed and agility.

Move in a straight line up to your movement speed, moving through hostile creatures’ spaces and ending your movement in a space of your choice that can hold you.

Make two Taijutsu attacks comparing the result to all hostile creatures of your choice’s AC whose spaces you pass through, dealing your Unarmed Damage + 1d4. If you hit a creature with two or more attacks, they must make a Dexterity Saving Throw. On a failed save, they are knocked Prone.

If you move through a Large or larger creature’s space, for each space of theirs you move through after the first, you make one additional attack against them.

Until the end of your turn, you can target one affected creature with a Taijutsu Finisher regardless of range, once per turn, using either an Action or Bonus action, ignoring its listed casting time.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and the damage by 1d4.

Rising Dragon.description:
You move to strike a target from below, lifting them off of the ground.

Make a Taijutsu attack, dealing your Unarmed Damage + 1d8.

The target is launched 30 feet into the air until the end of your current turn, landing on their feet with no falling damage at the end of the current turn unless otherwise stated.

Until the end of your turn, you can target one affected creature with a Taijutsu Finisher regardless of range, once per turn, using either an Action or Bonus action, ignoring its listed casting time.

Royal Guard.casting_time: 1 Reaction, which you take when you take damage
Royal Guard.description:
You quickly mold your chakra, creating multiple layers of armor from it and raising your guard to nullify an attack at the exact moment it would hit you.

When you would take damage you nullify the impact by meeting it with an equal amount of chakra.

Until the start of your next turn, each time you would take damage, you can spend chakra equal to the damage taken, gaining Immunity to the attack or jutsu’s damage and effects until the end of the current turn. If an effect does not deal damage or cost chakra, this jutsu does not prevent its effects.

You can activate this jutsu's effects a number of times equal to your Taijutsu ability modifier per casting.

Rushing Lion.description:
You focus chakra throughout your muscles enhancing your physical Strength and Dexterity.

For the duration, your Strength and Dexterity ability scores become 16 if they are lower than 16. Your Jump height is doubled and you cannot make Strength or Dexterity checks at disadvantage.

When you cast a Taijutsu that affects an area and forces a Saving Throw, increase the size of the area by +5 feet.

Second Heavenly Breath: Panting.description:
As a requirement to activate this jutsu, you must have First Heavenly Breath: Inhale currently active.

You end your concentration on that jutsu and this one takes its place, maintaining the same duration limitation and jutsu casting restrictions.

You retain all of the effects and duration of that jutsu, stacking them with this jutsu’s effects.

You increase your lungs capacity fourfold. Doing so increases your oxygen intake even further as your body expands and your muscles become more prominent.

Increase your Taijutsu Attack Bonus by +1, bonus taijutsu damage by 1d8 twice per turn, and you gain 10 Temporary Hit Points.

Serpent Fang Double.description:
As a requirement to activate this jutsu, you must currently be in the Serpent Fist Stance.

You enter a low striking stance showing your overwhelming focus and precision as you disable your opponent with surgical accuracy. Make two Melee Taijutsu Attacks dealing your Unarmed Damage + 1d8.

A creature who is hit by at least one of these attacks must make a Constitution Saving Throw. On a failed save they gain +1 rank of Weakened.

If this jutsu is used as a Finisher, you instead deal your Unarmed Damage + 1d12 and if you score two hits on the target, they must make a Constitution Saving Throw, gaining +2 rank of Weakened on a failed save.

At Higher Ranks: For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and the damage by 1d8 or 1d12.

Silent Movement.description:
As a requirement to activate this jutsu, you must currently be in the Silent Fist Stance.

You enter a neutral stance, designed to exemplify silence and emptiness throwing most creatures off of being able to predict your actions. You do not spend chakra to maintain concentration on this jutsu.

For the duration, creatures cannot make Reactions to one of the following. Pick one (This cannot be changed unless this jutsu is recast):
- Your Movement.
- Bonus Actions you make.
- Reactions you take.

Snake Constricting Grip.description:
When you deal Unarmed Damage to a creature as a result of an Unarmed attack, you can cast this jutsu as part of that same attack. When you do, that target must make a Strength Saving Throw, being Restrained on a failed save.

As an action on the target creature's turn, they may attempt a Strength Saving Throw to escape your hold.

Straight Impact.description:
You take a readied stance preparing your fist or foot for a single powerful strike.

When you activate this jutsu, you can spend 5 chakra coating your fist in this chakra. You learn to be able to commit additional actions to make this attack stronger.

You can spend your Bonus Action and an additional 5 Chakra to magnify this jutsu by 1 step.

You can spend your Reaction and an additional 5 chakra to magnify this jutsu by 1 step.

You can inflict the Stunned condition on yourself at the end of your turn until the beginning of your next turn to magnify this jutsu by 1 step.

Make a single fiery taijutsu attack. On a hit, you deal your unarmed damage + 2d4 on a hit. For each step you magnify this jutsu by, increase the bonus damage by 2d4.

If this jutsu is used as a Finisher, for each step you magnify this jutsu by, increase the bonus damage by 4d4.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank increase the chakra spent activating this jutsu’s initial & additional effect by 3. If this jutsu is cast at B-Rank, increase the damage die of this jutsu by 1 step (D4>D6). If this jutsu is cast at S-Rank, increase the damage die of this jutsu by 1 step (D6>D8).

Swallow Dance.description:
You perform a powerful wide sweeping roundhouse kick, lifting both yourself and all creatures you strike.

All creatures in a 10-foot cone originating from you must make a Dexterity Saving Throw. On a failed save they take your unarmed damage + 1d8 and are launched 15 feet into the air until the end of the current turn, falling Prone.

Until the end of your turn, you can target one affected creature with a Taijutsu Finisher regardless of range, once per turn, using either an Action or Bonus action, ignoring its listed casting time.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and the damage by 1d8.

Switch Kick.description:
You leap and perform a swift double kick in an attempt to support your team by queuing up a powerful finisher.

As a part of casting this jutsu, you must have either a Bonus Action or Reaction available to use. Make two taijutsu attacks against a creature within range dealing your Unarmed Damage on a hit.

If you score at least a successful hit with this jutsu, you must spend either your Bonus Action or Reaction. When you do, you grant your ally an additional Reaction which they can only use to cast a Taijutsu with the Finisher Keyword that has a casting time of 1 Action.

Until the end of your turn, you or an allied creature can target one affected creature with a Taijutsu Finisher regardless of range, once per turn, using either an Action, Bonus action or Reaction ignoring its listed casting time.

Wild Dance.description:
You first attack your opponent with a kick, which is immediately followed by a punch and another kick, striking them at 3 different angles. Make three Melee Taijutsu Attacks. On a hit, each attack deals 1d8 Bludgeoning Damage and push them 5 feet in any direction of your choice. If the target cannot be pushed back because of a structure or construct such as a wall or tree, you strike them into it, dealing an additional +1d6 damage.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and the damage by 1d8. If you cast this jutsu at B-Rank or higher, increase the damage the target takes from striking a wall by 1d6. If this jutsu is cast at S-Rank, increase the damage the target takes from striking a wall by 1d6.

Wise Turtle.description:
You focus chakra throughout your muscles enhancing your physical Strength and Cunning. For the duration, your Strength and Wisdom ability scores becomes 16 if they are lower than 16. Your lifting Strength is doubled and you gain a +2 to your passive perception.

Once per turn, when you would cast a Taijutsu with a range greater than 5 feet, increase its damage by +1 damage die.

1-Shot Crushing Blow.description:
You perform a rising strike with your weapon, striking and crushing the target from below.

Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack using your weapon, dealing your Weapon’s Damage + 2d6. On a hit, the target must also succeed a Strength Saving Throw, reducing their AC by 1d4 until the start of their next turn.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and the damage by 1d6.

1-Strike Slash.description:
You perform a wide arcing slash with your weapon, slicing into them with little wasted movement.

Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack using your weapon, dealing your Weapon’s Damage + 2d6. On a hit, the target must also succeed a Constitution Saving Throw, gaining 1 rank of Bleeding on a failed save.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and the damage by 1d6.

2-Cross Strike.description:
You perform a double striking slash with your weapon, attacking two different angles forming an “X” at the intersections of the attack.

Make two Melee Taijutsu Attacks using your weapon dealing your Weapon’s Damage. On each hit, the target must also succeed a Constitution Saving Throw, gaining 1 rank of Bruised on a failed save.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and the target suffers a -1 penalty on their save.

2-Point Penetrate.description:
You perform a double strike attacking at your opponent’s shoulders or legs in an attempt to destabilize them.

Make two Melee Taijutsu Attacks using your weapon, dealing your Weapon’s Damage. If a target is hit at least once, it must also succeed a Constitution Saving Throw reducing the target's speed by 10 feet for each successful attack, until the end of their next turn.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and the target suffers a -1 penalty on their save.

36 PSI Air Cannon.description:
You use the air itself to slash the target from a distance. As you swing your sword, you launch an air-compressed projectile spiraling towards the target.

Make a Ranged Taijutsu Attack against a target creature in range. On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage + 1d12. The creature must make a Dexterity Saving Throw, gaining 1 rank of Slowed on a failed save. A Slowed creature remakes their saving throw at the end of each of their turns.

If this jutsu is cast as a Chain 2, this jutsu deals an additional 2d12 damage. If this jutsu is cast as a Chain 3, the target creature gains an additional rank of Slowed.

**At Higher Ranks:** For every rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage die by +1.

3-Lateral Slash.description:
You perform a triple strike attacking your opponent’s joints in an attempt to disarm and disable them.

Make three Melee Taijutsu Attacks using your weapon, dealing your Weapon’s Damage. Do not add your ability modifier to the damage dealt.

Once, if you would deal damage with this jutsu, the target must also succeed a Constitution Saving Throw, dropping any weapon they have as it is knocked 10 feet away from them and becoming Dazed until the end of their next turn.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and the target suffers a -1 penalty on their save.

3-Point Pierce.description:
You perform a 3-point strike in multiple points made to penetrate the target's defense. Make three Melee Taijutsu Attacks with your weapon, dealing your Weapon’s Damage. Do not add your ability modifier to damage dealt.

The target must also make a Constitution Saving Throw. On a failed save, they gain one rank of Weakened until the end of their next turn.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and the target suffers a -1 penalty on their save.

Achilles Heel.description:
You aim to cripple your target by aiming at the weak point in their armor. Target one creature in range that is wearing armor. Make a Martial Arts Check vs their AC. If you roll higher than their AC, you have noticed their weak spots in their armor.

For the duration, you ignore any Damage Reduction (DR) from their Armor and their AC is reduced by 1. This jutsu ends early if you lose sight of them.

Arrow Notch Slash.description:
You slice into a creature in an instant slash, leaving no room for interference. Only the target creature can react to this jutsu.

Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack against a target creature in range. On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage + 2d4 and you can choose to move 10 feet away from the creature before the damage is rolled.

**At Higher Ranks:** For every rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 2d4.

Biding Fury Stance.description: You enter a stance to absorb the damage you take to prepare to dish out even more. Every time you are hit or would react to an attack to make it miss you gain 1 Fury. You can hold a number of Fury equal to your level at a time. This Fury can be spent on other jutsu with the “Binding Fury-” Prefix.

Biding Fury: Dragon Flurry.description: (Must be under the effects of a Binding Fury Stance to cast) You perform a rapid combo of attacks to break down your enemy. Make two Melee Taijutsu Attacks, dealing your Weapon’s Damage + 1d4 on a hit. If you land both attacks, you can spend 2 or more Fury to make an additional attack per Fury spent, up to 4 attacks.

Biding Fury: Horizontal Block.description: (Must be under the effects of a Binding Fury Stance to cast) When you would be hit with an attack, you can spend 2 or more Fury to try and parry the damage. Roll your Weapon’s Damage Dice a number of times equal to the amount of Fury spent and reduce the damage taken by the rolled amount. If you would reduce this damage to 0, make a number of attacks per every 2 Fury spent, dealing your Weapon’s Damage Dice on a hit.

Blade of Sin: Sloth.description:
You seek to emulate the power of one of the Seven Deadly Sins of Humanity in your blade, imbuing the Sin of Sloth inside the edge. Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack against a creature in range. On a hit you deal your Weapon’s Damage + 1d8. The target creature must make a Constitution Saving Throw. On a failure, they move down the initiative tracker as they lose the motivation to act as fast as before.

If this jutsu is cast as a Chain 2, it deals an additional 2d8 damage. If this jutsu is cast as a Chain 3, the target has disadvantage on its Constitution Saving Throw.

**At Higher Ranks:** For every rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 1d12. Starting at A-Rank, if the target is last in initiative when they would fail their Saving Throw, they instead cannot move or act until the end of their next turn.

Blunt Strike.description:
You ready your weapon before you bludgeon the weapon with your chakra and aim for your target's core striking at the center of their chest.

Make a Ranged Taijutsu Attack using your weapon, dealing your Weapon’s Damage + 2d4 as Bludgeoning Damage. On a hit, the target must succeed a Constitution Saving Throw. On a failed save, the target is Dazed and if they would make a concentration check to maintain a Genjutsu or Ninjutsu, they roll an additional 1d8, reducing their check by the result.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and the damage by 2d4.

Bounce Chain Ricochet.description:
You make your attack with the aim that it hits as many people as possible. Make a Ranged Taijutsu Attack against a creature in range. On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage + 1d8. On a hit, you can make a second Ranged Taijutsu Attack against another creature in range with a -2 penalty to the attack roll. If this second attack hits, you can make a third attack against a creature in range, this time with an additional -2 penalty.

**At Higher Ranks:** For every rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 1d8.

Breath of Ash: Scorch.description:
You begin to collect and manifest fire release chakra until it laces the striking portion of your weapon. The fire release chakra begins to transform into gouts of ash that emanate off of your weapon with a menacing haze.

Select a creature you can see in range and make a single Ranged Taijutsu Attack, with a +1 bonus to your critical threat range. On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage + 2d6 Fire Damage and the target is overwhelmed by the ash causing them to be Blinded until the beginning of their next turn, or the first time they are targeted by an attack before their turn.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and the damage by 1d6. If this jutsu is cast at B-Rank, you can target a second creature with this jutsu. If this jutsu is cast at S-Rank, you can target a third creature with this jutsu.

Breath of Beasts: Fang.description:
You begin to collect and manifest chakra until it laces the striking portion of your weapon. The chakra begins to manifest in the form of any beast of your choice in any color that can be seen plainly by others.

You begin to swing wildly and unpredictably, fueled by instinct and primal urges. Make two Melee Taijutsu Attacks, dealing your Weapon’s Damage + 1d6. You do not add your ability modifier to the damage rolled.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost of this jutsu by 3. If this jutsu is cast at C-Rank or higher, increase the damage by 1d6. If this jutsu is cast at B-Rank, increase the number of attacks by +1. If this jutsu is cast at S-Rank, increase the number of attacks by +2.

Breath of Dust: Sokusei.description:
You begin to collect and manifest earth release chakra until it laces the striking portion of your weapon. The earth release chakra magnifies the weight and striking power of your attacks, allowing you to tear through anything in your path with little difficulty.

Make a single Ranged Taijutsu Attack against one creature you can see within range. This jutsu cannot score a critical hit. On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage + 1d12 Earth Damage and the target is pushed back 5 feet.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and the damage by 1d12.

Breath of Earth: Smash.description:
You begin to collect and manifest earth release chakra until it laces the striking portion of your weapon. The earth release chakra magnifies the weight and striking power of your attacks, allowing you to crush anything in your path with little difficulty. You fool your opponent(s) into thinking you are striking and suddenly shift your attack into another angle.

All creatures within range whose Taijutsu ability score is lower than your own suffer a 1d4 penalty to this jutsu’s Saving Throw.

All creatures of your choice must make a Dexterity Saving Throw. On a failed save, they take your Weapon’s Damage + 2d6 Earth Damage and are knocked Prone and Bruised; on a successful save, they take half as much damage and suffer no further effects.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost of this jutsu by 3, the damage by 1d6, and the radius by 5 feet. If cast at B-Rank, creatures suffer a 1d6 penalty to this jutsu’s Saving Throw. If cast at S-Rank, creatures suffer a 1d8 penalty to this jutsu’s Saving Throw.

Breath of Echo: Reverb.description:
You begin to collect and manifest chakra until it forms the shape of a sound note hovering over the striking portion of your weapon. This note is visible to any creature that can manipulate chakra.

You fire two powerful shots creating explosions of sound that disorient your foes on contact. Make two Ranged Taijutsu Attacks, dealing your Weapon’s Damage.

On each hit, the target and all creatures within 5 feet must make a Wisdom Saving Throw, becoming Dazzled on a failed save.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 1d4. If cast at C-Rank or higher, increase the number of attacks by +1. If cast at B-Rank or higher, targets are also Dazed on a failed save.

Breath of Enoki: Infest.description:
You collect and manifest medical chakra until it laces the striking portion of your weapon, causing it to glow with a soft pink hue.

For the duration, when you deal damage with a weapon or Taijutsu attack using this weapon, once per turn the target must make a Constitution Saving Throw, reducing their AC by 1 for the duration. A creature can only have their AC reduced by this jutsu twice.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and increase the AC reduction limit by 1.

Breath of Flame: Unknowing.description:
You collect and manifest fire release chakra until it laces the striking portion of your weapon. The fire release chakra transforms into gouts of flame erupting off your weapon with a glorious flicker.

Select a creature you can see within your full movement range. Move into a space adjacent to the target.

Make a single Melee Taijutsu Attack against the target with a +1 bonus to your critical threat range. On a hit, deal your Weapon’s Damage + 2d6 + 2 Fire Damage. On a critical hit, the target gains 1 rank of Burned.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and your critical threat range by +1. If cast at B-Rank, increase damage by 1d6 + 1. If cast at S-Rank, critical hits quadruple the Fire Damage.

Breath of Rain: Cumulous.description:
You collect and manifest water release chakra until it laces the striking portion of your weapon. The chakra transforms into streams of water flowing around your weapon, enhancing your strike.

Make a single Ranged Taijutsu Attack against one creature you can see. On a hit, deal twice your Weapon’s Damage Dice plus your Taijutsu ability modifier in Cold Damage. The target must make a Constitution Saving Throw or be Dazed.

This attack roll cannot be made at disadvantage or suffer penalties due to conditions, hostile jutsu, traits, or features.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and increase your Weapon’s Damage Dice by +1. If cast at C-Rank or higher, gain a +1d4 bonus to hit if the target is Prone or Dazed. If cast at B-Rank or higher, gain a +1d6 bonus to hit if the target is Prone, Weakened, or Dazed. At S-Rank, this attack roll is made at advantage regardless of circumstance.

Breath of Roses: Plum.casting_time: 1 Reaction, which you take when you take damage, excluding from a Genjutsu
Breath of Roses: Plum.description:
You collect and manifest medical chakra until it laces the striking portion of your weapon, causing it to glow with a soft pink hue.

When you would take damage, you make a series of rotating strikes to deflect as much damage as possible. Reduce the damage taken by your Weapon’s Damage + 2d8.

All hostile creatures adjacent to you must make a Dexterity Saving Throw or take Poison Damage equal to the damage you reduced, or half as much on a successful save.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and increase damage reduced by 1d8. If cast at C-Rank or higher, increase the damage range to 10 feet. If cast at B-Rank or higher, increase damage reduction die size to d10. At S-Rank, creatures that fail their save take double damage.

Breath of Skies: Cloud Fall.description:
You collect and manifest wind release chakra until it laces the striking portion of your weapon, spiraling around it to create whipping torrents of wind that propel your strikes with the force to cut through clouds and pierce the sky.

Make two Ranged Taijutsu Attacks against one creature you can see within range. On a hit, deal your Weapon’s Damage Dice as Wind Damage and inflict 1 rank of Bleeding. You do not add your ability modifier to the damage rolls.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the number of attacks by +1.

Breath of Sound: Roar.description:
You collect and manifest chakra into the shape of a sound note hovering over the striking portion of your weapon. All surrounding sound becomes muffled as you enter a deep state of focus.

You attach the explosive tool to your weapon and perform a symphony of swings as the tag readies to detonate. All creatures except yourself must make a Wisdom Saving Throw.

- **On a failed save:** Take your Weapon’s Damage + 1d12, become Dazzled and Blinded until the start of their next turn.
- For each rank of quality your explosive tool is above base quality, creatures suffer a -1d4 penalty to their saving throw.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 1d12. If cast at B-Rank or higher, affected creatures are Blinded until the end of their next turn.

Breath of Sparks: Jolt.description:
You collect and manifest lightning release chakra until it laces the striking portion of your weapon, sparking violent jolts. Roll 1d4 to determine the number of creatures you can see within range to target.

Make a Ranged Taijutsu Attack against each target, dealing twice your Weapon’s Damage Dice + 1d8 Lightning Damage. You do not add your ability modifier to the damage.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and upgrade the die used to determine target number (D4>D6>D8>D10>D12). If cast at C-Rank or higher, increase damage by 1d8. If cast at B-Rank or higher, increase your Weapon’s Damage Dice by 1. If cast at A-Rank or higher, increase damage by 1d8. If cast at S-Rank, increase your Weapon’s Damage Dice by 1.

Breath of Thunder: Flash.description:
You collect and manifest lightning release chakra until it laces the striking portion of your weapon, sparking violently. Select a creature you can see within your full movement range. Move into a space adjacent to the target.

Make a single Melee Taijutsu Attack. On a hit, deal your Weapon’s Damage + 2d10 Lightning Damage. If the target has Temporary Hit Points, damage is applied to both their Hit Points and Temporary Hit Points simultaneously. Do not add your ability modifier to the damage.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and damage by 1d10. At C-Rank, select a second creature within 30 feet of the original target, move adjacent, and make a second attack. At B-Rank, select a third creature within 30 feet of the second target, move adjacent, and make a third attack. At A-Rank or higher, select a fourth creature within 30 feet of the third target, move adjacent, and make a fourth attack.

Breath of Water: Surface.description:
You collect and manifest water release chakra until it laces the striking portion of your weapon, transforming into streams of water. You make a concentrated strike.

Make a single Melee Taijutsu Attack against a creature you can see. On a hit, deal your Weapon’s Damage + 1d10 Cold Damage. The target must succeed on a Strength Saving Throw or be Dazed.

This attack roll cannot be made at disadvantage or suffer penalties from conditions or hostile jutsu, traits, or features.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and damage by 1d10. At C-Rank or higher, gain +1d4 to hit if the target is Prone or Dazed. At B-Rank or higher, gain +1d6 to hit if the target is Prone, Weakened, or Dazed. At S-Rank, this attack roll is made at advantage regardless of circumstance.

Breath of Wind: Cutter.description:
You collect and manifest wind release chakra until it laces the striking portion of your weapon. The chakra spirals around your weapon creating whipping torrents of wind. You use this enhanced field to propel yourself towards an enemy.

Make three Melee Taijutsu Attacks against one creature you can see within range. On a hit, deal your Weapon’s Damage Dice as Wind Damage. You do not add your ability modifier to the damage.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the number of attacks by +1.

Burst Fire.description:
You ready several attacks before unleashing all of them out in front of you. All creatures in a 30-foot cone originating from you must make a Dexterity Saving Throw.

- On a failed save, they take your Weapon’s Damage + 1d6.
- On a successful save, they take half damage.

If rolling your weapon’s ammunition die, roll twice and take the lower result.

If cast as Chain 2, this jutsu deals an additional 1d6 damage. If cast as Chain 3, the additional damage becomes 2d8.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 1d6.

Bursting Fling.description:
You imbue your weapon with chakra, turning it into a hazard even after it lands. Make a Ranged Taijutsu Attack. On a hit, deal your Weapon’s Damage + 1d6.

Regardless of the attack's success, the weapon shatters, creating a minefield in a 10-foot radius around the target that lasts until the start of your next turn. The first time a creature moves within this radius, it takes 2d4 Slashing Damage.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and both damage values by 1d6.

Carpet of Steel.description:
You ready a stack of your weapons and scatter them across the ground up to 45 feet away in a 20-foot cube. The area becomes difficult terrain, and creatures that move while inside the area suffer 1d4 Piercing Damage for every 5 feet they move within it. Spaces that have already been traversed are no longer difficult terrain and no longer deal damage if moved through again.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the radius by 5 feet.

Chain Pull.description:
You throw your weapon, wrapping it around a target and pulling them towards yourself. The target must succeed on a Strength Saving Throw.

- **Failed Save:** The target is moved 10 feet closer to you in a straight line, cannot make hand signs until the start of their next turn, and becomes Restrained by you. At the end of the target's turns, they can attempt a Strength Saving Throw to escape.

If cast as Chain 2, you can target an additional creature in range. If cast as Chain 3, affected creatures have disadvantage on the initial Saving Throw.

Chakra Touched Ammunition.description:
You lace all of your ammunition with chakra, enhancing both its lethality and efficiency.

For the duration, whenever you deal damage with the affected weapon's ammunition property, you add an additional 1d4 damage of the weapon’s type, twice per turn.

Additionally, when rolling your ammunition die, roll an additional ammunition die and take the higher result.

Finally, if you cast a jutsu that spends a whole ammunition die, you may choose to end this jutsu instead of spending the die.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3. At C-Rank, increase the damage to 2d4. At A-Rank or higher, increase the damage to 3d4.

Crippling Strike.description:
You focus your weapon's attack on crippling your enemy, making them far less effective.

Make a Melee or Ranged Taijutsu Attack based on your weapon. On a hit, the target must succeed on a Strength Saving Throw or become Dazed, Weakened, and knocked Prone.

On a critical hit, the target makes their saving throw at disadvantage.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the Weapon’s Damage Dice by 1.

Curved Slash.description:
You perform a single throw that curves and slashes with frightening accuracy. Make a Ranged Taijutsu Attack against a creature within range.

On a hit, deal your Weapon’s Damage + 2d8. The target must make a Constitution Saving Throw or be Blinded until the end of their next turn. If they fail by 5 or more, they are Blinded until the end of your turn.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 1d8.

Cutting Vibrations.description: You focus your chakra into your weapon so that it vibrates at supersonic speeds, enhancing its cutting capabilities. For the duration, when you deal Slashing Damage with your weapon to a target wearing armor, you reduce the target’s Armor bonus by 1. This can only occur once per round. If this reduces their Armor bonus to 0, you instead deal an extra die of your Weapon’s Damage.

Dance Performance: Neutral Stance.description:
You draw your weapon, taking on a light stance like that of a dancer. For the duration of this jutsu, any Bukijutsu you cast with "Dance Performance" in its name has an increased critical threat range. Increase the critical threat range of Taijutsu Attack rolls of the aforementioned jutsu by +1.

If the jutsu forces a Saving Throw, creatures that roll a 1 or 2 on the d20 take double damage if they fail.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3. At C-Rank, increase the critical threat range by +1. At A-Rank, increase the critical threat range by +2, and creatures that roll a 5 or lower on the saving throw are considered vulnerable.

Dancing Fool’s Dance.description:
You swing your weapon in a wide arc striking all creatures in the arc.

Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack. All creatures of your choice within your weapon’s range originating from you become targets of this attack, comparing your attack result to each target's AC individually. On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage + 2d4 and each creature must succeed on a Dexterity Saving Throw or be knocked Prone.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 2d4.

Dancing Fool’s Whip.description:
You violently whip your weapon with enough force to crack the ground from the impact. Creatures in a 15-foot cube originating from you must succeed on a Dexterity Saving Throw, being whipped repeatedly by your weapon.

- **Failed Save:** Take your Weapon’s Damage + 2d4 and gain the Bleeding condition.
- **Successful Save:** Take half damage and no additional effects.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 1d4.

Danger Zone.description:
You quickly spin your weapon around you, using chakra to extend its range further. All creatures within range must make a Dexterity Saving Throw.

- **Failure:** Take 3d6 Slashing Damage and gain a rank of Bleeding.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and damage by 2d6. If cast at A-Rank, target creatures take half damage on a successful save.

Debilitating Shot.description:
You begin to throw weapons rapidly targeting your enemies' pressure points to puncture them. Make a Ranged Taijutsu Attack dealing your Weapon’s Damage + 4d4.

The target must make a Constitution Saving Throw, gaining 1 rank of Weakened on a failed save as your senbons lodge themselves into their joints, or half as much damage on a successful save.

A creature Weakened by this jutsu can, as an action, make a Wisdom (Survival) check vs your Taijutsu Save DC to remove the lodged senbons on a success.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the number of creatures you can target by +1.

Demonic Dance.description:
You spin around with your weapon, a dance-like attack that bewilders enemies. Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack against all creatures in range. On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage, increasing by 1d4 for each creature hit.

**At Higher Ranks:** For every rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the range of this jutsu by 5 feet. If cast at A-Rank, the range instead becomes your current movement speed.

Devils Gambit.description:
You take a bet fit for a devil. At the cost of enhancing your weapon's lethality and accuracy, you throw caution to the wind.

Until the beginning of your next turn, the first weapon or Taijutsu attack made as a result of a Bukijutsu you cast is at advantage and you increase your Weapon’s Damage Dice by 1.

But in exchange, all creatures' first attack made targeting you is at advantage.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3. If cast at B-Rank, increase your Weapon’s Damage Dice by 3. If cast at S-Rank, increase your Weapon’s Damage Dice by 5.

Double Shot.description:
You prep two separate attacks to go off in a single attack.

Before the end of your current turn, the next time you would make a Ranged Weapon Attack, you make an additional one as part of the same action, which must target another creature. Additionally, this additional attack benefits from any effects that would normally only affect the first or one weapon attack.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3. If cast at B-Rank, increase the number of additional attacks to two. If cast at S-Rank, increase the number of additional attacks to three.

Double Trouble.description:
You perform a swift burst of 2 shots that leave the enemy staggering. Make two Ranged Taijutsu Attacks using your weapon, dealing your Weapon’s Damage + 1d6.

If a target is hit at least once, it must succeed a Strength Saving Throw or have its speed reduced by 10 feet for each successful attack, until the end of its next turn.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the target suffers a -1 penalty on their save.

Dragon Fly Dash.description:
You launch your weapon towards an allied creature you can see within range, ordering them to strike with it in your place.

Select one willing creature you can see within range and throw your chosen weapon to them. Until the end of the current turn, the thrown weapon retains all bonuses and effects as if you were wielding it.

The target creature can spend their Reaction to make one Melee Taijutsu Attack targeting a creature within their range, dealing the Weapon’s Damage plus your ability modifier.

As part of the same Reaction, the allied creature can choose to throw your weapon back to you.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the number of attacks the allied creature can make by +1.

Dragon Slayer Thrust.description:
You charge a thrusting attack before lashing with precise timing to deal a lethal blow to your enemy.

Make a Martial Arts Check versus a target creature's AC within range. If you roll higher, this jutsu gains advantage on the attack roll.

Move up to the target creature; this movement does not provoke opportunity attacks. Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack. On a hit, deal your Weapon’s Damage and force the creature to make a Constitution Saving Throw. On a failed save, they cannot take reactions until the end of the current turn.

If cast as a Chain 2, you gain advantage on your Martial Arts Check. If cast as a Chain 3, you deal twice your weapon’s damage on a hit.

**At Higher Ranks:** For every rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 1d8.

Dragon’s Far-Reaching Fist.description:
You perform two quick shots that disorient and debilitate the enemy.

Make two Ranged Taijutsu Attacks against a creature you can see within range, dealing your Weapon’s Damage.

On each hit, the target must succeed on a Constitution Saving Throw or become Dazed.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the target suffers a -1 penalty on their saving throws.

Dragonfly Landing.description:
You jump up and then stab down with an uncounterable amount of thrusts. Make 3 Melee Taijutsu Attacks against a target creature in range. On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage Dice. If you hit a creature with at least 3 attacks, they are knocked Prone as you land on top of them.

**At Higher Ranks:** For every rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the number of attacks by 1.

Echo-Thrust.description: You pour chakra into your forearm so that you can thrust twice in one motion. The first time you hit a creature with a weapon attack on each of your turns, you can deal damage to a second creature that is within 5 feet of both you and the original target.

Enhanced Blocking.description:
You brace your weapon and enter a more guarded stance. You cannot lose concentration on this jutsu as a result of damage.

For the duration, while wielding a Polearm weapon, you gain an additional +1 bonus to AC.

Additionally, any AC bonuses from the blocking property or weapon seals are added to the first Strength or Dexterity Saving Throw you make each round.

You can spend your Reaction when you would take damage to reduce that damage by twice your Weapon’s Damage Dice. If this reduces the damage to 0, you gain an additional Reaction until the start of your next turn that can only be used to cast this jutsu again.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage reduced by 1 Weapon’s Damage Dice.

Eternal Edge.description:
You line your weapon with a chakra-thin edge, protecting it from any damage. Your weapon cannot suffer any penalties from any trait, feature, or jutsu of equal rank or lower that would destroy or damage the weapon, or reduce its attack rolls.

**At Higher Ranks:** For every rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3. Starting at C-Rank, the duration becomes 10 minutes. Starting at B-Rank, the duration becomes 1 hour. Starting at A-Rank, the duration becomes 8 hours. Starting at S-Rank, the duration becomes 24 hours.

Exterminate.description:
You strike twice in an X-shape in an attempt to hamper your opponent’s ability to attack back. Make two Melee Taijutsu Attacks. On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage Dice + 1d12. If both attacks are successful, your opponent must make a Constitution Saving Throw. On a failure, they suffer a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the end of their next turn.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3, the damage by 1d12, and the attack roll penalty by 1.

Far-Reaching Fang.description:
Your weapon is an extension of yourself, your fang to defend what needs defending. You flood your weapon with chakra to enhance its ability to fly far and its damage power. Make a Ranged Taijutsu Attack against a creature in range. On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage + 2d10, and the target must make a Strength Saving Throw or be knocked back 15 feet. If they hit a structure or construct, they are pinned to it, becoming Grappled until they use an action to free themselves.

**At Higher Ranks:** For every rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 1d8. If cast at B-Rank, the knockback increases by an additional 15 feet. If cast at S-Rank, the knockback increases by another additional 15 feet.

Flashing Streaks.description:
You ready yourself to throw your weapons at high speeds, making streaks of light in the air. Make a Ranged Taijutsu Attack against a number of creatures in range equal to your Taijutsu ability modifier. On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage + 2d4 Slashing Damage and the target creature must make a Dexterity Saving Throw or gain 2 ranks of Bleeding.

**At Higher Ranks:** For every rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 1d4.

Flying Swallow: Cross Cut.description:
As a part of the activation of this jutsu, you must have a weapon in both hands that meet this bukijutsu component requirements. You make two swinging cuts in a single stroke by swinging both of your weapons inward.

Make two Taijutsu attacks against up to two enemies within 5 feet of you, dealing the Weapon’s Damage + 1d4, and the target must make a Strength Saving Throw to avoid being disarmed of their weapon or item they are holding.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 1d4.

Flying Swallow: Spinning Top.description:
As a part of the activation of this jutsu, you must have a weapon in both hands that meet this bukijutsu’s component requirements.

You spin like a top striking all creatures in your immediate vicinity. All creatures within your weapon's range must make a Dexterity Saving Throw. On a failed save, they take your Weapon’s Damage + 2d6 or half as much on a success.

Depending on the damage type of the chosen weapons, creatures who fail their Saving Throws suffer additional effects:
- Bludgeoning: Affected creatures are knocked Prone.
- Piercing: Affected creatures gain 1 rank of Weakened until the end of their next turn.
- Slashing: Affected creatures gain 1 rank of the Bleeding condition.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 1d6.

Flying Swallow: Straight Line.description:
As a part of the activation of this jutsu, you must have a weapon in both hands that meet this bukijutsu’s component requirements.

You dash in a straight line, up to 30 feet, moving through any hostile creatures’ spaces you come across, ending your movement in a space up to 30 feet away from you, in a straight line.

Make two Melee Taijutsu Attacks. All creatures of your choice whose space you passed through as a result of this jutsu count as targets for these two Melee Taijutsu Attacks, comparing their results to each creature’s AC.

On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage + 1d4, and the damaged creatures must make a Strength Saving Throw, being knocked Prone on a failed save, or no further effects on a success.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 1d4.

Grass-Cutting Strike.description:
You swing your weapon low, in an attempt to hobble the enemy. Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack targeting one creature in range. On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage + 2d4 and lower your opponent’s speed by half until the end of their next turn as you cut at their ankles.

If this jutsu is cast as a Chain 2, it deals an additional 3d4 damage. If this jutsu is cast as a Chain 3, the damage die of this jutsu becomes d8.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage die by +1.

Great Dragon Shockwave.description:
You quickly raise and slice down with your blade with such force that it creates a shockwave. Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack against a target creature in range. On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage + 1d8.

All creatures within range other than the target must make a Strength Saving Throw or be knocked back 15 feet.

**At Higher Ranks:** For every rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 1d8.

Heavenly Uproar.description: You swing upwards with a rising force to the heavens before swinging back down to bring your opponent crashing to the earth. Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack against a creature in range. On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage and the creature must make a Strength Saving Throw. On a fail, you make a second Melee Taijutsu Attack that deals your Weapon’s Damage + 1d12 on a hit. On a success, you make the attack but at disadvantage, and you cannot gain advantage on this attack by any means.

Hidden Shadow Shot.description:
You throw your weapon, but hiding in its shadow is the true attack. Make a Ranged Taijutsu Attack against a creature in range. The target creature must make a Perception Check versus a DC of 10 + your Sleight of Hand. On a fail, this attack gains advantage and the target cannot react. On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage.

If this jutsu is cast as a Chain 2, it deals an additional 2d6 damage. If cast as Chain 3, the additional damage becomes 2d8.

**At Higher Ranks:** For every rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3. If cast at B-Rank, increase the number of attacks by 1. At S-Rank, this jutsu gains an additional attack.

Hidden Weapon.description:
You are able to quickly draw and stow your weapon in such a fashion that it’s almost impossible to track or react to.

Until the end of the next turn, the first time you would make a weapon or Taijutsu attack using a weapon that fits this jutsu’s component requirement, you make such an attack at advantage, with a +1 bonus to the attack's critical threat range.

Once you deal damage to a creature with a weapon benefiting from this jutsu, as part of the same action used to attack, you can make a Sleight of Hand Check vs the target's Passive Perception. On a success, you hide the weapon before they realize what they were attacked with. On a failure, weapons you use cannot gain the benefit of this jutsu while targeting that creature until you complete a rest of any type.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3. If cast at B-Rank, increase the critical threat range bonus to +2. If cast at S-Rank, increase the critical threat range bonus to +3.

Holes of Despair.description:
(This jutsu cannot crit) You thrust your weapon out from different angles as you seek to riddle your opponent with holes. Make three Melee Taijutsu Attacks dealing your Weapon’s Damage Dice on hit. If at least two attacks are successful, the target creature gains a rank of Bleeding.

If cast as Chain 2, increase the rank of Bleeding by 1. If cast as Chain 3, make an additional attack.

**At Higher Ranks:** For every rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the ranks of Bleeding by 1. If cast at A-Rank or higher, it can regain the ability to score a critical hit.

Iaijutsu: Lion’s Song.description:
Placing a single, sheathed sword upright and listening to the "breath" of your opponent, you rapidly unsheathe, attack while passing by your target, and then re-sheathe your sword.

Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack against a creature in range. On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage + 1d10. If you beat your opponent’s AC by 10, they cannot react to this jutsu.

**At Higher Ranks:** For every rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage by 1d10. If cast at B-Rank, you only need to beat the AC by 5 to make the attack unable to be reacted to. If cast at S-Rank, you gain advantage on the roll. If you already have advantage, this jutsu’s casting cannot be reacted to.

Impaler Stab.description:
You thrust your weapon into your enemy and keep it there.

Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack. On a hit, deal your Weapon’s Damage. You can choose to keep it there. Doing so means you cannot attack with that weapon while it is Impaled; however, the target creature becomes Grappled by your weapon.

While Grappled, you can use your Bonus Action to twist the weapon, dealing your Weapon’s Damage Dice. You may also add your Weapon’s Damage Dice to all rolls to maintain the grapple. A creature can choose to forcibly remove themselves from the weapon as an action, automatically escaping the grapple but gaining 2 ranks of Bleeding.

**At Higher Ranks:** For every rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the damage die by 1. If cast at B-Rank, you have advantage on checks to maintain the grapple. If cast at S-Rank, the target instead gains two ranks of Lacerated when forcibly ending the grapple.

Iron Web Deflection.casting_time: 1 Reaction, which you take when you take damage
Iron Web Deflection.description:
You quickly wrap yourself in the chain or wire from your weapon to soften the blow of an attack before it actually strikes.

Roll your Weapon’s Damage Dice twice, then add your ability modifier. Reduce the triggering damage by the result.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost of this jutsu by 3 and roll your Weapon’s Damage Dice two more times.

Kiss of the Moon.description:
You send out your attack in a high arc that disappears from your opponent’s eyes and falls as if from the moon itself.

Make a Ranged Taijutsu Attack against a creature in range. They must make a Wisdom Saving Throw equal to your Taijutsu Save DC.

- **Failed Save:** This attack gains advantage as they lose sight of the attack as it rises up and falls back down.
- **Success:** This attack gains disadvantage as they keep track of it.

On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage + 2d6.

**At Higher Ranks:** For every rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the number of creatures you can target by one.

Knee Breaker.description:
A series of low jabs at an opponent's lower body with the intent to ruin their legs.

Make 2 Melee Taijutsu Attacks at a target creature in range. On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage.

If you hit a creature twice with this jutsu, they are knocked Prone. A creature knocked Prone from this jutsu must spend its full movement to stand up.

**At Higher Ranks:** For every rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the range of this jutsu by 5 feet.

If this jutsu is cast at B-Rank, increase the number of attacks by 1.

If this jutsu is cast at S-Rank, increase the number of attacks by 1.

Linear Drive.description:
You take a wide stance with your weapon before dashing to deliver a single thrust at the enemy at great speed, intending to ram them through.

Make a weapon attack against a target creature in range. You gain a +1 bonus to your attack roll for every 30 feet you moved, up to a maximum of +5.

On a hit, you deal your Weapon’s Damage plus 1d10 for every 30 feet you moved, up to a maximum of 3d10.

If you deal 20 or more damage with this jutsu, the target creature gains 1 rank of Bleeding and Slowed until the end of your next turn.

**At Higher Ranks:** For every rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and your movement speed by 30 feet.

Manipulated Tools: Binding Meteor.description:
You summon forth a weighted chain from your weapon scroll and use it to restrain multiple targets you can see within range.

Make a Melee Taijutsu Attack against up to three targets who are within 25 feet of one another. On a hit, you grapple them and chain them together. Chained creatures cannot move more than 25 feet from each other.

Additionally, chained creatures can use their action to make an Acrobatics or Sleight of Hand Check vs your Taijutsu Save DC to escape. Each failed escape attempt imposes a -2 penalty on subsequent checks by other chained creatures until the end of their next turn. This penalty stacks.

**At Higher Ranks:** For each rank you cast this jutsu above D-Rank, increase the cost by 3 and the number of creatures you can target by +1.

Manipulated Tools: Blade Kick.description:
You summon forth a series of swords, knives, and spears that you kick and launch towards a creature to impale them.
